attributes.additional_details:
I  Would Like the Government,  to Donate  a Percentage of any Profit  from the Falkland Oil Fields to  the many Service  and Ex Service Charities,    as a Massive Thank You  to all those Brave Men and Women who fight to defend  our Great Country
This could be done Annually,
  A lot of Brave Men Died,   and Many were Injured  in Liberating the Falklands.
Donating to Service Charities and Ex Service Charties
would be a great way of saying Thank You, and showing that they are not Forgotten
